titleStmt.title: A proclamation, for a publick thanksgiving. Edinburgh, the twenty sixth day of April, 1689.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Parliament. Committee of Estates.

notesStmt.note: Signed: Extracted forth of the records of the meeting of Estates, by me William More, Cls.
Thanksgiving for deliverance from "Popery and arbitary power."
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
